thread.title: Donald Glover Says "There's No Better Song To Have Sex To" Than "Bad And Boujee"
thread.title_full: Donald Glover Says "There's No Better Song To Have Sex To" Than "Bad And Boujee"

author: April Salud
title: Donald Glover Says "There's No Better Song To Have Sex To" Than "Bad And Boujee"
text:
“I think they’re the Beatles of this generation and I don’t think they don’t get a lot of respect outside of Atlanta. There’s a generation — sort of like the YouTube generation — that I came up with. There’s a generation of kids growing up with something that’s separate from a whole group of people. And honestly, that song [“Bad and Boujee”] is just fly. There’s no better song to have sex to.” ID: 10287955 5. And now you know. View this image ›
FX ID: 10287976 6. Listen to “Bad and Boujee,” and get to the kissy-kissy time. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=S-sJp1FfG7Q . youtube.com ID: 10287987 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
